subject: “Amendments to Standard RFP Documents for engagement of Consultancy Services for  Authority’s Engineer(AE)/Independent Engineer (IE)/ Supervision Consultant (SC) of NH Projects regarding - Issue of clarification regarding Reduction of Remuneration for attendance less than 90% of Key personnel/Sub Key Professional for Civil projects”
text: IRay 7754 TTHNf gifearot (Tew rRde &r TTHNf #AT4, IRa FRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #aqq TI #1-5 Qj 6, Raez-10, &rchl; Tf fcrlt 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TH/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/2022 Policy Circular No.10.2.32/ 2022 dated 05th December, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File NHAI/11018/01/2008-PQ-Part(6) (Comp. No. 115853)} Sub.: Amendments to Standard RFP Documents  for engagement of Consultancy Services for Authority' s Engineer(AE)/Independent Engineer (IEJ/ Supervision Consultant (SC) of NH Projects regarding Issue of clarification regarding Reduction of Remuneration for attendance less than 90% of personnel/Sub Professional for Civil projects reg: To ensure the deployment and presence of personnel at project site in under implementation projects or at O&M stage, Policy Circular no. 10.2.15 dated 18.07.2018 had been issued by NHAI, which is applicable to the RFP documents for AE/IE/SC. As per the said Policy Circular, there is a provision for reduction of remuneration in case of availability of the personnel/ Sub- Professional for less than 90% period during the month: 2 The above provision was also included in RFP documents for engagement of AE/IE issued by the Ministry on 15.02.2019. In this regard, some clarifications have been sought on reduction in remunerations in case of short attendance of deployed Team Leader /Key Personnel. The following clarifications amendments are hereby issued: - (a) (i) In case the Team Leader cum Senior Highway Engineer has not been made available for 90% of the stipulated time in the month excluding permissible casual leave then only 80% of the monthly payment of all the personnel during the month shall be released. Similarly for RE, Engineer / Other personnel, the mentioned reduction shall be done in the payment of remuneration of all personnel during the month: In the case of "Other Personnel the average availability across the group shall be considered for calculation. (ii) Similarly, in case of "Sub-Professional staff" the average availability across the Sub-Professional shall be considered and reduction in payment of all Sub Professional shall be done at the rates specified: (b) The Team Leader / each Personnel/Sub-Professional will be allowed 12 days Casual Leave (CL) in a year with prior intimation to the Authority. Out of this, a maximum of 3 CLs can be availed either separately or together in a quarter and the period of the CLs would be counted as Personnel/Sub-Professional on duty.
